thread.title: U.S. Freezes $65 Million in Funding for U.N. Palestinian Refugee Agency

author: Felicia Schwartz
title: U.S. Freezes $65 Million in Funding for U.N. Palestinian Refugee Agency
text:
VANCOUVER, British Columbia—The U.S. will withhold at least $65 million from the United Nations agency for Palestinian refugees, U.S. officials said Tuesday, making good on a threat by President Donald Trump.
The move follows deliberations among national security aides to Mr. Trump, who complained in a Jan. 2 Twitter message that the U.S. pays Palestinians hundreds of millions of dollars a year but receives “no appreciation or respect in return.”
